name: Rouge (woody_builder)
description:
A small game created during the 48 secret jam (May 2018) with the theme "selling - colors".

Gather as many colors as you can! Blend them together and see how great is the world you have created with them.

Once you get the right tool you can click to add force to the color balls, you will also be able to resize the space where they move.

I hope you enjoy this game as much as i did creating it.
